text: @HackneyAbbott My Dad is an auxiliary nurse putting his life in danger for 1500pm, 2 of his coworkers have tested positive for coronavirus, they're all white btw but of course that doesn't fit your narrative. He, nor any of the NHS workers give a fuck about race, they treat everyone the same!
